title: The role charities can play in getting Londoners into work (Greater London Authority)
text: ( Source : Greater London Authority ) Just under half of disabled Londoners are in work, compared to three quarters of non-disabled people.[2] Only 7.8 per cent of Employment and Support Allowance ( ESA ) claimants on the Work Programme move
